title: How did the fire at Camp Lejeune get started? Some say controlled burn that got out of control. Some say it was training and live rounds on base. Which one was it? Thanks
text:
Test firing seems to be the answer. Here's a link to our latest
story:
http://www.starnewsonline.com/article/20110325/WIRE/110329804?p=all&tc=pgall
